com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.utility

Class VideoUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.utility.VideoUtilities

  • public final class VideoUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Special video utilities used throughout the library and also open to users. Used for easier video management.
